item.title: Introvert Networking Made Easy üåü ‚Ä¢ Start with close contacts; practice builds confidence. ‚Ä¢ Use: ‚ÄúI admire your work on X; can we discuss it over coffee?‚Äù ‚Ä¢ Limit events to 1-2 per month; quality over quantity. ‚Ä¢ Follow up within 48 hours; keeps you fresh in their mind. ‚Ä¢ Prepare 2-3 topics to discuss; minimizes on-the-spot pressure.
